atk-s0519a0:20_0: Tena yā bhāsitā netti, satthārā anumoditā;
atk-s0519a0:34_1: Yathā hi taṇhā satte kāmādibhavaṁ nayatīti ‘‘bhavanettī’’ti vuccati,
atk-s0519a0:34_2: evamayampi veneyyasatte ariyadhammaṁ nayatīti saddhammanayanaṭṭhena ‘‘nettī’’ti vuccati. Atha vā nayanti tāyāti netti.
atk-s0519a0:34_3: Nettippakaraṇena hi karaṇabhūtena dhammakathikā veneyyasatte dassanamaggaṁ nayanti sampāpentīti,
atk-s0519a0:34_4: nīyanti vā ettha etasmiṁ pakaraṇe adhiṭṭhānabhūte patiṭṭhāpetvā veneyyā nibbānaṁ sampāpiyantīti netti.
atk-s0519a0:34_5: Na hi nettiupadesasannissayena vinā aviparītasuttatthāvabodho sambhavati.
atk-s0519a0:34_7: Sabbāpi hi suttassa atthasaṁvaṇṇanā nettiupadesāyattā, netti ca suttappabhavā,
atk-s0519a0:35_0: Sā panāyaṁ netti pakaraṇaparicchedato tippabhedā hāranayapaṭṭhānānaṁ vasena. Paṭhamañhi hāravicāro, tato nayavicāro, pacchā paṭṭhānavicāroti.
atk-s0519a0:35_2: Sabbāpi hi netti saṅgahavāro vibhāgavāroti vāradvayameva hoti.
atk-s0519a0:36_0: Tattha saṅgahavāro ādito pañcahi gāthāhi paricchinno.
atk-s0519a0:36_1: Sabbo hi pakaraṇattho ‘‘yaṁ loko pūjayate’’tiādīhi pañcahi gāthāhi apariggahito nāma natthi.
atk-s0519a0:36_2: Nanu cettha paṭṭhānaṁ asaṅgahitanti? Nayidamevaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
atk-s0519a0:36_4: Tathā hi vakkhati – ‘‘aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā kuhiṁ daṭṭhabbā sāsanapaṭṭhāne’’ti.
atk-s0519a0:36_5: Mūlapadapaṭṭhānāni hi atthanayasaṅkhārattikā viya aññamaññaṁ saṅgahitāni.
atk-s0519a0:37_1: Tesu ‘‘tattha katame soḷasa hārā’’ti ārabhitvā yāva ‘‘bhavanti aṭṭhārasa padānī’’ti ayaṁ uddesavāro.
atk-s0519a0:37_2: ‘‘Assādādīnavatā’’ti ārabhitvā yāva ‘‘tettiṁsā ettikā nettī’’ti ayaṁ niddesavāro.
atk-s0519a0:37_3: Paṭiniddesavāro pana hāravibhaṅgavāro hārasampātavāro nayasamuṭṭhānavāro sāsanapaṭṭhānavāroti catubbidho.
atk-s0519a0:37_4: Tesu ‘‘tattha katamo desanāhāro’’ti ārabhitvā yāva ‘‘ayaṁ pahānena samāropanā’’ti ayaṁ hāravibhaṅgavāro.
atk-s0519a0:37_5: Tattha ‘‘katamo desanāhārasampāto’’ti ārabhitvā yāva ‘‘anupādisesā ca nibbānadhātū’’ti ayaṁ hārasampātavāro.
atk-s0519a0:37_7: Vuccate – yattha anekehipi udāharaṇasuttehi eko hāro niddisīyati, ayaṁ hāravibhaṅgavāro.
atk-s0519a0:37_8: Yattha pana ekasmiṁ sutte aneke hārā sampatanti, ayaṁ hārasampātavāro. Vuttañhetaṁ peṭake –
atk-s0519a0:40_1: Sāsanapaṭṭhānavāro pana saṅgahavāre viya uddesaniddesavāresupi na sarūpato uddhaṭoti.
atk-s0519a0:40_3: bhagavatā anumodita’’nti ca kathametaṁ viññāyatīti? Pāḷito eva.
atk-s0519a0:40_4: Na hi pāḷito aññaṁ pamāṇataraṁ atthi.
atk-s0519a0:40_5: Yā hi catūhi mahāpadesehi aviruddhā pāḷi, sā pamāṇaṁ.
atk-s0519a0:40_6: Tathā hi agarahitāya ācariyaparamparāya peṭakopadeso viya idaṁ nettippakaraṇaṁ ābhataṁ.
atk-s0519a0:40_7: Yadi evaṁ kasmāssa nidānaṁ na vuttaṁ.
atk-s0519a0:40_10: 1.57 ādayo) kaccāyanasaṁyuttādīnaṁ nidānaṁ bhāsitanti? Nayidaṁ ekantikaṁ.
atk-s0519a0:40_11: Sāvakabhāsitānaṁ buddhabhāsitānampi hi ekaccānaṁ paṭisambhidāmagganiddesādīnaṁ dhammapadabuddhavaṁsādīnañca nidānaṁ na bhāsitaṁ, na ca tāvatā tāni appamāṇaṁ, evamidhāpi daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0519a0:41_0: Nidānañca nāma suttavinayānaṁ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaupālittherādīhi mahāsāvakeheva bhāsitaṁ, idañca mahāsāvakabhāsitaṁ,
atk-s0519a0:41_1: theraṁ muñcitvā anaññavisayattā imissā vicāraṇāyāti kimetena nidānagavesanena, atthoyevettha gavesitabbo, yo pāḷiyā aviruddhoti.
atk-s0519a0:41_2: Atha vā pāḷiyā atthasaṁvaṇṇanābhāvato na imassa pakaraṇassa visuṁ nidānavacanakiccaṁ atthi,
atk-s0519a0:42_0: Idāni etasmiṁ pakaraṇe nānappakārakosallatthaṁ ayaṁ vibhāgo veditabbo – sabbameva cetaṁ pakaraṇaṁ sāsanapariyeṭṭhibhāvato ekavidhaṁ,
atk-s0519a0:42_3: tathā saṅgahavibhāgabhāvato dhammavinayatthasaṁvaṇṇanato lokiyalokuttaratthasaṅgahaṇato rūpārūpadhammapariggāhakato lakkhaṇalakkhiyabhāvato pavattinivattivacanato sabhāgavisabhāganiddesato sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇadhammavibhāgato ca.
atk-s0519a0:43_0: Tividhaṁ puggalattayaniddesato tividhakalyāṇavibhāgato pariññattayakathanato pahānattayūpadesato sikkhattayasaṅgahaṇato tividhasaṁkilesavisodhanato mūlagītianugītisaṅgītibhedato piṭakattayatthasaṁvaṇṇanato hāranayapaṭṭhānappabhedato ca.
atk-s0519a0:44_1: Pañcavidhaṁ abhiññeyyādidhammavibhāgato pañcakkhandhaniddesato pañcagatiparicchedato pañcanikāyatthavivaraṇato ca.
atk-s0519a0:45_0: Tattha sāsanapariyeṭṭhibhāvatoti sakalaṁ nettippakaraṇaṁ sikkhattayasaṅgahassa navaṅgassa satthusāsanassa atthasaṁvaṇṇanābhāvato.
atk-s0519a0:45_3: Byañjanatthavicārabhāvatoti hārabyañjanapadakammanayānaṁ byañjanavicārattā atthapadaatthanayānaṁ atthavicārattā vuttaṁ.
atk-s0519a0:45_6: Lakkhaṇalakkhiyabhāvatoti nettivacanassa lakkhaṇattā udāharaṇasuttānañca lakkhiyattā vuttaṁ.
atk-s0519a0:45_7: Sabhāgavisabhāganiddesatoti samānajātiyā dhammā sabhāgā, paṭipakkhā visabhāgā, taṁvicārabhāvatoti attho.
atk-s0519a0:45_8: Sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇadhammavibhāgatoti pahānekaṭṭhasahajekaṭṭhatādisāmaññena ye dhammā yesaṁ dhammānaṁ nāmavatthādinā sādhāraṇā tabbidhuratāya asādhāraṇā ca,
atk-s0519a0:46_8: Suttādhiṭṭhānavibhāgatoti lobhadosamohānaṁ alobhādosāmohānaṁ kāyavacīmanokammānaṁ saddhādipañcindriyānañca vasena cuddasavidhassa suttādhiṭṭhānassa vibhāgavacanato cuddasavidhanti attho.
